replies.msg:
中咗 3/8

Health authorities were also ramping up testing to cover hundreds of workers at the airport as the city reported a new imported case on Wednesday, along with the case of the 66-year-old woman – the first local transmission in more than three weeks – and her five-year-old granddaughter. The woman’s husband tested preliminary positive as well.

https://www.scmp.com/news/hong-kong/health-environment/article/3084153/coronavirus-eight-relatives-locally-infected

replies.msg:
順便提提大家
已經有國際新聞及記者報左新城市單野！！！
Twitter 戰線手足整咗個網站出嚟比大家做task
自己入去rt + like + reply
https://act4hk.com/twitter

入bot 拎任務24小時更新：
https://t.me/TwitterHelpBot

另有手足會係佢Twitter Account 每日更新任務:
https://twitter.com/TweetingforHK

或者download 香城online 個app 都有Twitter 任務做
http://bit.ly/HKOnlinePortal

replies.msg:
都係多一宗啫
無須過慮
可繼續出街行山聚餐

mola mola
阿婆傳俾廢老，廢老通常鍾意剝口罩食煙，得閒咳兩聲打個乞嗤，一路鬧人廢青一路噴晒啲口水，傳俾其他廢老

如是者其他廢老都係咁做，一傳百，百傳萬，萬傳億，億傳兆

mola mola
